ComicInfo.Summary:
Adapted from the Netflix original series! The frogs oldest foe returns and the Spider-God Nahradhan reveals his plans him and the poison scrolls. Burn and Wilka continue their own quest for the scrolls but the return of the spider armies requires one of them to sacrifice themselves! Kulipari creator Trevor Pryce, with Joshua Starnes and Sonia Liao, change the rules in this issue and the world of Kulipari will never be the same!
Note: The digital edition (10/5/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
